Articles.Content:
Don't mind this ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) just trying out the spoiler tag I've been seeing a lot ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) :">

> 
> To hide or not to hide

it's (spoiler=insert stuff here)stuff(/spoiler)

Replace brackets with square ones.

Eg: 

> 
> stuff

> 
> it's (spoiler=insert stuff here)stuff(/spoiler)
> Replace brackets with square ones.
> 
> Eg: 
> 
> 
> > 
> > stuff

Ah, got it, thanks! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> To hide or not to hide
